pkgmetadata.longdescription: Qualitative Harmonic Analysis // Multivariate description of the state changes of a qualitative variable by Correspondence Analysis and Clustering. See: Deville, J.C., Saporta, G. (1983). Correspondence analysis, with an extension towards nominal time series. Journal of econometrics, 22(1-2), 169-189. Corrales, M.L., Pardo, C.E. (2015) doi:10.15332/s2027-3355.2015.0001.01. Analisis de datos longitudinales cualitativos con analisis de correspondencias y clasificacion. Comunicaciones en Estadistica, 8(1), 11-32.
